summary: A gang raid a bank, making off with a nice tidy sum and head off to a hideout in the mountains to take refuge, with a few women in tow to keep them company. Soon these robbers start being killed by an unknown black-gloved figure.
cast: Herb Andress|Paola Arduini|Lucy Chevalier|Ivano Davoli|Giovanni De Angelis|Irina Maleeva|Enrico Manera|Gianni Manera|Antonio Monselesan|Alessandro Perrella|Mario Pisu|Ettore Ribotta
title: Ordine firmato in bianco
